title: The Misadventures of Romesh Ranganathan
overview: In The Misadventures of Romesh Ranganathan, Romesh is travelling way beyond his comfort zone and the world of complimentary breakfast buffets, to some of the most beautiful, but dangerous places on earth. Hosted by locals and fully immersed in the local culture, he gets an eye-opening, and at times heart-stopping, insider's guide to countries that are big on natural beauty, character and charm.
